hints.content:
I started with $32$ ounces of flour and addded $47$ more ounces.

I can add $32+47$ to find the total number of ounces of flour I had before using any.
Next, I can subtract the $61$ ounces of flour I had left at the end of the week from this sum to find out how many ounces of flour I used during the week.

question.content:
I had a container that contained $32$ ounces of flour. On Monday I added $47$ ounces of flour to the container. During the week, I made cookies and waffles with some of the flour.  At the end of the week, the container had $61$ ounces of flour remaining.  
 
**Which equation could I use to find out how many ounces $(\blueD{o})$ of flour I used during the week?**  

[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]
